body:

This PR includes changes to ComInterop that have also been made in dotnet/runtime#44564.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: Open PRs should not be assigned to milestone, so they are not assigned to the wrong milestone after they are merged.  For backport consideration, use a `backport` label.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: This PR makes changes to [ComInterop](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/ComInterop/README.md), so a corresponding PR has been opened at dotnet/runtime#44564.
